name: Redemption Legguards
tooltip:
Redemption LegguardsLevel 60

Commander Eligor Dawnbringer at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a pair of Redemption Legguards if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Legguards, 20 Wartorn Plate Scraps, 4 Arcanite Bars and 2 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Legguards
- Wartorn Plate Scrap x 20
- Arcanite Bar x 4
- Nexus Crystal x 2
